properties.address: Connaught Theatre, West Sussex BN11 1LG
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 7th January 2024** From Monday 8th January 2024 until Monday 11th March 2024 Fraser’s Bar - Upstairs in the Connaught Theatre will be open on Mondays between 3pm – 8pm, with free hot drinks, Baked goods, activity packs, books, board games and a kindness rack ( with free warm clothes that anyone is welcome to take). On Monday evenings we will also have representatives from different charities and support groups to offer advice and raise awareness. Keep an eye out on our website for who will be coming and when. https://wtm.uk/warmspaces/ We will also be distributing free cinema tickets for Monday evenings and Saturday morning pictures through partnerships with local community groups and advice giving organisations who directly support those in need.
properties.title: Connaught Theatre ( Frasers Bar)

properties.address: 2-4 High Street, Bognor Regis, West Sussex PO21 1SS
properties.description: Grandads Front Room offers a safe and comfortable environment for anyone seeking refuge from the cold. The community hub is heated, accessible, and open to all, providing a non-judgmental space where people feel valued and supported. We serve free hot meals, soups, and hot drinks like tea and coffee to ensure that those in need can enjoy nourishment and warmth. We also provide take-home flasks of hot meals like homemade curry or stew to those facing food insecurity. Our activities, such as community group meetings, social events, and casual chats over a cuppa, encourage interaction and help combat isolation. By bringing people together around shared food or creative workshops, we build a sense of belonging and community support, reducing loneliness and fostering positive connections.
properties.title: Grandads Front Room

properties.address: Goring United Reformed Church, West Sussex, West Sussex BN12 4EA

Hosted by friendy people A group of people are already meeting, consider joining them, with cake and games

properties.address: The Salvation Army, West Sussex PO21 1DW
properties.description: A space for all to connect. On Tuesdays we offer support and community. On Wednesdays, we promote an intergenerational space, where toddlers and their parents/carers can mix with the wider community. On Fridays, 'Family Open House' is aimed at parents with children up the age of 18. In partnership with 'Family Support Work', the space offers food, support and sharing of parenting and life skills. Term Time Only. A range of drinks are available free, but we ask for £1 to receive breakfast rolls (Tues) and soup (Weds).
properties.title: Open House

properties.description: We're open for anyone to come in and relax. There are various activities for families during the week, plus we have Playcentre pre-school and Refresh coffee shop on site, and access to support services such as Early Help and CAP Debt Help. This winter we have FREE tea and coffee available thanks to Arun District Council, and we're supported by a Southern Water Community Centre Grant

properties.description: Broadwater Support has a community Hub at 32 South Farm Rd BN14 7AE. The Warm Hub will be open: Monday to Fridays 10am to 3pm Thursday evening 7pm to 10pm Everybody is welcome. It includes a Community Food Pantry for those who are struggling to manage with a small donation of £5. It also offers a Pet Pantry, School Uniform centre and a free café where people can have free food and drinks and chat to the volunteers.

properties.description: Worthing Museum and Art Gallery will be available as a Warm Space with exhibitions and displays for every age. There is even a book corner! The Warm Spaces over is running every Saturday afternoon 2pm to 5pm and Thursday evening 5pm to 8pm. Free hot/cold drinks and activities will be available. Drop in craft sessions will be available each week until the end of March 2025. More details on our provisions can be found at: https://wtm.uk/
